name: Jam Brothers Party
description:
You have to submit your jam game on time! 

Discuss with your teammate about the design of your game and make your decisions. 

You can play the game you made!

---Controls---

Click on the dialogs with the options that you want in your game.

The characters will say the controls of any mechanic that you can choose.

---Developers---

Jórge Cásedas - Programmer

Kumi Daniel Carretero - Artist

---CAUTION---

DON´T USE THE HOOK OPTION! There´s a problem and you could not play your game.

We´ll fix it after the voting time.
